attributes.name: Max Health
attributes.description: Base health pool for all living entities.

attributes.name: Follow Range
attributes.description: Distance at which mobs will begin to track a target.

attributes.name: Knockback Resistance
attributes.description: Resistance to knockback from attacks and explosions.

attributes.name: Movement Speed
attributes.description: Horizontal walking speed for living entities.

attributes.name: Flying Speed
attributes.description: Flight speed used by flying entities and creative players.

attributes.name: Attack Damage
attributes.description: Base melee damage dealt by the entity.

attributes.name: Attack Speed
attributes.description: Time between melee attacks in ticks.

attributes.name: Armor
attributes.description: Total armor value reducing incoming damage.

attributes.name: Armor Toughness
attributes.description: Helps armor stay effective against large damage hits.

attributes.name: Luck
attributes.description: Affects loot tables and other chance based mechanics.

attributes.name: Step Height
attributes.description: Maximum height of blocks that can be stepped over automatically.

attributes.name: Fall Damage Multiplier
attributes.description: Scales the damage taken from falling.

attributes.name: Safe Fall Distance
attributes.description: Distance that can be fallen before taking damage.

attributes.name: Scale
attributes.description: Multiplies the rendered and collision size of the entity.

attributes.name: Block Interaction Range
attributes.description: Distance a player can interact with blocks.

attributes.name: Reach Distance

entity_specific.name: Horse Jump Strength
entity_specific.description: Determines the vertical power of a horse's jump.

entity_specific.name: Zombie Spawn Reinforcements
